# rootTemplate

**Instance Property**

The root template in the navigation hierarchy.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var rootTemplate: CPTemplate { get }
```

## Accessing Templates

- **topTemplate**: The top-most template in the navigation hierarchy.
- **templates**: The contents of the navigation hierarchy.
